heading: Likes
para: ALikes keep team conversations interactive. Like a message to acknowledge a request, demonstrate appreciation, or indicate agreement.

heading: Likes Activity
para: Track likes you’ve received and given with your Likes Activity log. Discover popular messages from your team.

heading: Emoji
para: Add some character to your messages with a full library of emojis to choose from. Select from our six skin tones for a more personalized experience.

heading: GIPHY support
para: Paste any GIPHY URL into a message, and your image will automatically expand and animate. Online conversations wouldn't be the same without GIFs.

heading: Light/Dark theme
para: Rest your weary eyes with our available Dark Theme. Especially beloved by developers, our Dark Theme provides a black background for your app.

heading: Open API/Webhook
para: Build your own integrations and bots with our open API and Webhooks. Create topics for aggregated information from other apps or extract info from Typetalk.

heading: Nulab Account
para: Quickly log in to all three Nulab Apps—Cacoo, Backlog, and Typetalk—using a single email address and password.

heading: Organization management
para: Administrators can manage members, teams, subscriptions, and billing information all in one place. Change account settings across all apps

heading: Teams
para: Organize members into Teams for easier onboarding and management. Add new members or remove old ones with a few clicks.

heading: Login history
para: Track the apps you have accessed along with your login locations

heading: Edit plans and payment details
para: Only designated plan administrators can make changes to billing and plans. Make changes to any of your Nulab app plans.
